title: Piyawong's Website
description: My personal website built with Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and Framer Motion
longDescription: A personal website built with Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and Framer Motion. It is a responsive website that is fully optimized for performance.

title: Task Management App
description: Collaborative project management tool with real-time updates
longDescription: A collaborative task management application that enables teams to organize projects, assign tasks, track progress, and communicate in real-time. Built with Next.js and Socket.io for real-time functionality, featuring drag-and-drop interfaces, file uploads, and team collaboration tools.

title: AI Chat Assistant
description: Intelligent chatbot with natural language processing capabilities
longDescription: An AI-powered chat assistant that can understand and respond to natural language queries. Built with Python and FastAPI backend, integrated with OpenAI GPT models, featuring conversation memory, context awareness, and custom training capabilities for domain-specific knowledge.

title: Analytics Dashboard
description: Real-time data visualization and business intelligence platform
longDescription: A comprehensive analytics dashboard that provides real-time insights into business metrics. Features interactive charts, customizable widgets, data filtering, export capabilities, and automated reporting. Built with Vue.js and D3.js for powerful data visualizations.

title: Social Media API
description: RESTful API for social media platform with authentication
longDescription: A robust RESTful API for a social media platform featuring user authentication, post creation and management, real-time messaging, friend connections, and content moderation. Built with Node.js, Express, and MongoDB with comprehensive testing and documentation.

title: Weather Forecast App
description: Mobile-responsive weather application with location services
longDescription: A beautiful and intuitive weather application that provides accurate forecasts, current conditions, and weather alerts. Features location-based services, interactive maps, historical data, and customizable notifications. Built with React Native for cross-platform compatibility.
